10:58 <gdelhumeau> Hi Devs  
10:59 <gdelhumeau> Could you look at XWIKI-11755? It might be a velocity problem during the initialization of something like that  
11:12 <gsmeria> has quit  
11:17 <gdelhumeau> clirr-maven-plugin is a pain  
11:18 <gdelhumeau> it nevers handle my exclusions on lesscss-api  
11:18 <gdelhumeau> I don't know why  
11:19 <gdelhumeau> I've found a workaround but it is not good  
11:32 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: I'm otp but we can talk about this  
11:32 <vmassol> because I've not had problems in the mast  
11:32 <vmassol> \*past  
11:34 <gdelhumeau> fixed actually -\_-

13:20 <sdumitriu> has quit  
13:28 <rokp> has joined #xwiki  
13:28 <rokp> helo  
13:28 <rokp> is it possible to obtain groups from ldap to xwiki?  
13:28 <rokp> and how?  
13:30 <sdumitriu> has joined #xwiki  
13:30 <tmortagne> rokp: what do you mean exactly by "obtain" ? the LDAP authenticator is able to synchronize a configured list of LDAP groups with XWiki groups if that's the question  
13:31 <tmortagne>   see http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/LDAPAuthenticationUseCases#HIwanttobeabletoreuseLDAPusersmembershipinXWiki  
13:33 <Denis> has joined #xwiki  
13:38 <rokp> has quit  
13:46 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
13:54 <rokp> has joined #xwiki  
14:05 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
14:13 <OSIMasson> has joined #xwiki  
14:14 <vmassol> working on the quality build for rendering, to fix it  
14:16 <ClemensR> has left #xwiki  
14:28 <lucaa> has quit  
14:29 <lucaa> has joined #xwiki  
14:40 <Pbas> has quit  
14:46 <rokp> ok i found it out ....  
14:46 <gsmeria> has quit  
14:46 <rokp> do i need to restart xwiki every time i add new group mapping?  
14:48 <tmortagne> rokp: depends how you add it, any modification to xwiki.properties files require a restart but you can also do the modification as XWikiPreference document level for a specific wiki  
14:48 <tmortagne> s/as/at/  
14:49 <rokp> how can i do XWikiPreference modification?  
14:51 <tmortagne> in a standard XE if you go to XWiki.XWikiPreference document you will be redirected to admin but you can directly edit it using http://myhost/xwiki/bin/edit/XWiki/XWikiPreferences?editor=object and search for LDAP field in the XWikiPreferences object  
14:51 <tmortagne> you can also install http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LDAP+Application for that I think  
14:53 <Pbas> has joined #xwiki  
14:53 <tmortagne> I tend to prefer keeping configuration like this in xwiki.cfg but I can understand the frustration if you plan to modify it often  
14:53 <rokp> nice  
14:53 <gsmeria> has joined #xwiki  
14:53 <rokp> thank you for now  
14:53 <tmortagne> you're welcome :)  
14:54 <rokp> you saved my day  
14:55 <rokp> by
